author: pier
msg: [Cocoon 2.0] Added the ImageSerializer from StyleBook. (For my XTECH tutorial)

author: pier
msg: [Cocoon 2.0] Added the XALAN filter. Fully working in SAX.
Congratulations to the XALAN team. Good work.

author: rubys
msg: Remove assumptions on "init" being a special target.
Note: when built with older versions of ant (including the one currently
checked into xml-cocoon), the init target will be executed twice, resulting
in the banner message being echoed twice.  Otherwise this is harmless.
If you build with current versions of ant, you will get the following:
The class attribute is deprecated. Please use the classname attribute.

author: stefano
msg: [cocoon 2.0] Another version of the logo + its SVG representation :)
